info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 19 at 9:30PM EST until January 20 at 6:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. Locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte County. In Michigan, Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST /5 PM CST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to snow covered roads and rapidly changing visibilities from both the falling snow and patchy blowing snow. The hazardous conditions will impact mainly the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow showers are expected to increase in intensity during the overnight hours. One or more heavier bands of snow are expected overnight into Thursday over portions of LaPorte and Berrien counties. Snowfall rates of 1 inch or more per hour will be possible late tonight into Thursday morning. Some patchy blowing snow is possible during the overnight hours tonight. Total snow amounts by late Thursday afternoon will vary greatly with the highest accumulations likely for western Berrien county into northern and northwest LaPorte county.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
